testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlOrganizationInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.2 [Need to Provide Information on Organizations, Centers, and Contacts] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Organization Information (NTRM 3.3.2.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N4R16_Publish_Organization_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N4R16_Publish_Organization_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Organization Information (NTRM 3.3.2.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N4R17_Subscribe_to_Organization_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N4R17_Subscribe_to_Organization_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R26_Organization_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R26_Organization_Name_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Location is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R27_Organization_Location_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R27_Organization_Location_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Function Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R28_Organization_Function_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R28_Organization_Function_Description_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Contact Information (ContactInformation) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R29_Organization_Contact_Information__ContactInformation__Supported = ${TMDD_N4R29_Organization_Contact_Information__ContactInformation__Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Organization Contact Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R30_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R30_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Contact Person Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R31_Contact_Person_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R31_Contact_Person_Name_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Contact Person Role is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R32_Contact_Person_Role_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R32_Contact_Person_Role_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Work Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R33_Work_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R33_Work_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Alternate Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R34_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R34_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cellular Phone Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R35_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R35_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Cellular Phone Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R36_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R36_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Fax Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R37_Fax_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R37_Fax_Number_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pager Number is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R38_Pager_Number_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R38_Pager_Number_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pager Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R39_Pager_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R39_Pager_Identifier_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Internet E-Mail Address is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R40_Internet_E_Mail_Address_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R40_Internet_E_Mail_Address_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Radio Unit Identifier is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R41_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R41_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Line 1 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R42_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R42_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Line 2 is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R43_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R43_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address City is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R44_Mailing_Address_City_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R44_Mailing_Address_City_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address State is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R45_Mailing_Address_State_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R45_Mailing_Address_State_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Zip Code is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R46_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R46_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Mailing Address Country is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.4.2.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R47_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R47_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Information (CenterInformation) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R48_Organization_Center_Information__CenterInformation__Supported = ${TMDD_N4R48_Organization_Center_Information__CenterInformation__Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Required Organization Center Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R49_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R49_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Name is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R50_Organization_Center_Name_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R50_Organization_Center_Name_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Location is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R51_Organization_Center_Location_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R51_Organization_Center_Location_Supported}

Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R52_Organization_Center_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R52_Organization_Center_Description_Supported}

Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R53_Organization_Center_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R53_Organization_Center_Type_Supported}

Step 33 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Organization Center Contact Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R54_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R54_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported}

Step 34 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Date and Time Change Information - Organization Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.2.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N4R55_Date_and_Time_Change_Information___Organization_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N4R55_Date_and_Time_Change_Information___Organization_Information_Supported}
Step 35 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 36 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 37 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 38 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 39 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 40 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 41 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 42 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 43 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 44 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N4R17_Subscribe_to_Organization_Information_Parameter SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 45 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 45.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 45.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N4R16_Publish_Organization_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 45.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 45.1.2.1 VERIFY that an organizationInformationMsg message was received.
Step 45.1.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-id data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 45.1.2.3 IF TMDD_N4R26_Organization_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.3.1 VERIFY that an organization-name data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 45.1.2.4 IF TMDD_N4R27_Organization_Location_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.4.1 VERIFY that an organization-location data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 45.1.2.5 IF TMDD_N4R28_Organization_Function_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.5.1 VERIFY that an organization-function data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 45.1.2.6 IF TMDD_N4R29_Organization_Contact_Information__ContactInformation__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.6.1 VERIFY that an organization-contact-details data frame exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 45.1.2.7 IF TMDD_N4R30_Required_Organization_Contact_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.7.1 VERIFY that a contact-id data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.8 IF TMDD_N4R31_Contact_Person_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.8.1 VERIFY that a person-name data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N4R32_Contact_Person_Role_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that a person-title data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N4R33_Work_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that a phone-number data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N4R34_Alternate_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that a phone-alternate data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N4R35_Cellular_Phone_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that a mobile-phone-number data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N4R36_Cellular_Phone_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a mobile-phone-id data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N4R37_Fax_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that a fax-number data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N4R38_Pager_Number_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a pager-number data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N4R39_Pager_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that a pager-id data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N4R40_Internet_E_Mail_Address_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that an email-address data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N4R41_Radio_Unit_Identifier_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that a radio-unit data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N4R42_Mailing_Address_Line_1_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that an address-line1 data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N4R43_Mailing_Address_Line_2_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that an address-line2 data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N4R44_Mailing_Address_City_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that a city data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.22 IF TMDD_N4R45_Mailing_Address_State_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.22.1 VERIFY that a state data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.23 IF TMDD_N4R46_Mailing_Address_Zip_Code_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.23.1 VERIFY that a zip-code data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.24 IF TMDD_N4R47_Mailing_Address_Country_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.24.1 VERIFY that a country data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.organization-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.25 IF TMDD_N4R48_Organization_Center_Information__CenterInformation__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.25.1 VERIFY that a center-contact-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 45.1.2.26 IF TMDD_N4R49_Required_Organization_Center_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.26.1 VERIFY that a center-id data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.27 IF TMDD_N4R50_Organization_Center_Name_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.27.1 VERIFY that a center-name data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.28 IF TMDD_N4R51_Organization_Center_Location_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.28.1 VERIFY that a center-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.29 IF TMDD_N4R52_Organization_Center_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 45.1.2.29.1 VERIFY that a center-description data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.30 IF TMDD_N4R53_Organization_Center_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.30.1 VERIFY that a center-type data element exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.31 IF TMDD_N4R54_Organization_Center_Contact_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 45.1.2.31.1 VERIFY that a center-contact-details data frame exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item.center-contact-list.center-contact-details
Step 45.1.2.32 IF TMDD_N4R55_Date_and_Time_Change_Information___Organization_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 45.1.2.32.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame organizationInformationMsg.organization-information-item
Step 45.1.2.33 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 45.1.2.34 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 45.1.2.35 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlOrganizationInformationUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N4R16_Publish_Organization_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 46 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 46.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 46.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 46.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 46.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 46.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 46.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 46.7 IF TMDD_N4R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 46.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 47 EXIT
